name: Gorilla Grip
description:
Gorilla Grip was a game made in about a week with a friend. I made all the art, all the animations and some of the code. José Felgueiras coded most of the code, though.

With Gorilla Grip, we wanted to make a 3D platformer where you have to hold your controller like the character, in order to make it different and, in a way, more immersive. The game has some bug and glitches but be kind, as the game was done in a small amount of time!

Control Gus through a construction site and be careful with the slimes! Jumping on top of them won't kill them, you have to use your own hands.

Use a PS4 controller!

  • Left Joystick - Movement
  • X - Jump
  • R1, R2, R3, L1, L2 and L3 - Grab enemies and platforms (Looks hard but it's actually easy! Just hold down both Rs and Ls with the index and middle fingers and press down the Joysticks with your thumbs!)

Known bugs and glitches:

  • Falling from a high place may make Gus go through colliders
  • When the ascending platforms move quickly, Gus may pass through it
  • Slimes' bodies sometimes glitch out
